item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Doris Lessing
item.description: "That is what learning is. You suddenly understand something you've understood all your life, but in a new way." -- Doris Lessing

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Amanda Cross
item.description: "A literary academic can no more pass a bookstore than an alcoholic can pass a bar." -- Amanda Cross

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by William Styron
item.description: "A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading." -- William Styron

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing ever happened." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Benjamin Disraeli
item.description: "There are three types of lies -- lies, damn lies, and statistics." -- Benjamin Disraeli

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Robert Orben
item.description: "Illegal aliens have always been a problem in the United States. Ask any Indian." -- Robert Orben

item.title: Teresalynn add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Sometimes people are beautiful. Not in looks. Not in what they say. Just in what they are." -- Markus Zusak
